message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a high-value product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob, but I have to prioritize my bottom line. Considering the value I know this product holds, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that number. How about we try $9500? I'm really interested in making a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob, and I appreciate your transparency about your budget. I'm willing to make a bit of a concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can do $10500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10000 and $10500, which would be $10250. Can you consider that price?

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. I can see you're serious about making this work. I'm willing to meet you at $10250, but I'm also considering the value of the product and the time we've spent negotiating. I can do $10500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, which is the price I mentioned earlier. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider that price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can do $10250, but I'm not going any higher. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm going to have to consider other options. What do you think?

I understand that you're trying to get a fair price, Alice, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, which is the price I mentioned earlier. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options, including buying from John for $15000. Can you reconsider?
